Package com.yzong.dsf14.RMIFramework.infra

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RMIRemoteObject
    This dummy interface is used to mark an object as RMI-compatible.
    RMIRemoteStub
    This interface extends the RMI Remote Object interface by forcing all stubs to have a function that sets the reference of its own RoR.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocateRMIRegistry
    The class only contains one method, which returns the RMI Registry Client for a given endpoint if valid.
    RemoteObjectRef
    This class holds the Remote Object Reference, which contains the hostname and port number for the RMI Service Host.
    RMIInvocationPkg
    This class contains all necessary information for an RMI function call, including the Object Reference, method name, and the argument list.
    RMIRegistry
    This class contains the entry point of RMI Registry Server.
    RMIRegistryClient
    This class provides methods to interact with an RMI Registry Server from a client's perspective.
    RMIRegistryServer
    Runnable class for RMI Registry Server.
    RMIServer
    This class contains the entry point for an RMI Server.
    RMIServerCLI
    This class contains the Runnable for the RMI Registry Command-Line Interface.
    RoREntryTable
    This class holds all Remote Object References within a RMI Server Host.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RMIInvocationException
    This Exception class is the wrapper for all exceptions during RMI Invocations.
